fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Predict if a role exists. You will know if it does or doesn't.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: On even number nights, if the role does exist, you will get 5 names, at least one is that role. If it doesn't exist, you will know how many roles of that alignment do. "Exist" *does not* include the dead, unless their role was hidden.
